EmailTemplate.description: SSSW - Used to notify the employee when the Case has been created via Snap It app
EmailTemplate.name: SSSW New Case Notification -Snap It - Employee
EmailTemplate.subject: Australia Post - Case: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Product or service enquiry
Reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear {!Case.Employee_Lastname__c},
Thank you for submitting a customer enquiry through Snap It on behalf of {!Case.PrimaryContactFirstName__c} {!Case.PrimaryContactLastName__c}. Your reference number is {!Case.CaseNumber}.
The request is currently being investigated by our Customer Support Team. We aim to respond to {!Case.PrimaryContactFirstName__c} within one business day.
Thank you, Australia Post {!Case.Thread_Id}
